name: Do Nut Cop
description:
Welcome to Do Nut Cop !

You have to bring back the maximum number of donuts to the police station.

Controls : 

  1. WASD or arrows key for movement.
  2. "e" key to enter the car, to get the donuts in the donut store and to store the donuts in the police station.
  3. "q" key to get off the car.

// Note : the Police Station is on the Left Edge of the map and the Donut Shop is on the Right Edge of the map //


It was made for the Game Off 2022. I did the code and lonek1ra did the art!
